Diet therapy
Diet therapy is the main component of naturopathic treatment. Food is regarded 
as medicine in Naturopathy, which must be taken in natural or maximum natural form only. Fresh seasonal fruits, fresh green leafy vegetables and sprouts are excellent for this purpose.
In naturopathy, food items are generally classified based on the acidic or alkaline 
ash they leave after digestion and burning down in the body. To remain healthy, 
it is important that food items be 80 per cent of alkaline and 20 per cent of acidic 
nature.
